cs.ualberta.ca.tunein

Interface CommenterControllerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommenterController

    public interface CommenterControllerInterface
    Controller CommenterControllerInterface Class: This class is an interface for the CommenterController. The purpose of this class is to modify the Commenter model and load/check user credentials.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeUsername(String name)
      This method changes the username of the user using the app.
      boolean checkValid(String commentID, Activity act)
      This method is for checking if the commenter's user id matches the comment creator's id so that they can edit the comment.
      void loadUser()
      This method loads the user info when there is a save of user info.

    • Method Detail

      • changeUsername

        void changeUsername(String name)
        This method changes the username of the user using the app.
        Parameters:
        name - The new username.

      • checkValid

        boolean checkValid(String commentID,
                 Activity act)
        This method is for checking if the commenter's user id matches the comment creator's id so that they can edit the comment.
        Parameters:
        commentID - The unique id of a commenter.
        act - The activity that calls this controller.

      • loadUser

        void loadUser()
        This method loads the user info when there is a save of user info.
